page.title: 16Bideford:S+SE.Cliveden Rd..
page.content: P.15 Cont.-at our house)all ride toge- ther on their bikes and build a camp in the woods.I also ride in the wood with ponies as much as I can.From the woods you can get to the river where we row our boat and fish.From our hou -se which is quite old you can see miles of land,the R.Torridge,the top ofÂ£Old Town',Â£Little America',the Torrington Rd.and the old iron bridge which used to be a railway bridge.We are not on the mains water supply and have our own well. ( Suzanne Pickard,Oldiscleave Farm.) Â£East-the -Water', by Kerry Searle Ilive at Cliveden Rd.,Bideford.I have a cat called Tiddles and a dog called Goldie.Itake him for a walk every night after school in a local playing field. The house in which I live is quite sma- ll.There are 3 bedrooms,a bathroom,a kitchen and a living/dining room___Cont
